mapper.select: SELECT EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.DEPOSIT_USE_SEQ AS depositUseSeq /* 예치금 사용 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.PARTNER_CD AS partnerCd /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.RESERV_NUM AS reservNum /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.PAY_DIV AS payDiv /* 지불 구분, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.PAY_TRANS_DD AS payTransDd /* 송금 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.USE_DEPOSIT_AMT AS useDepositAmt /* 사용 예치 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST /* 예치금 사용 내역 */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT /* 예치금 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.PARTNER_CD = EZC_DEPOSIT.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_DEPOSIT.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_DEPOSIT.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_PARTNER.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.DEPOSIT_USE_SEQ = #{depositUseSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예치금 사용 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST /* 예치금 사용 내역 */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT /* 예치금 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.PARTNER_CD = EZC_DEPOSIT.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_DEPOSIT.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_DEPOSIT.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_PARTNER.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.DEPOSIT_USE_SEQ = #{depositUseSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예치금 사용 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.RESERV_NUM = #{reservNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* #### SQL Body [[ ################# */ SELECT EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.DEPOSIT_USE_SEQ AS depositUseSeq /* 예치금 사용 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.PARTNER_CD AS partnerCd /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.RESERV_NUM AS reservNum /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.PAY_DIV AS payDiv /* 지불 구분, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.PAY_TRANS_DD AS payTransDd /* 송금 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.USE_DEPOSIT_AMT AS useDepositAmt /* 사용 예치 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST /* 예치금 사용 내역 */ ,EZC_DEPOSIT /* 예치금 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.PARTNER_CD = EZC_DEPOSIT.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_DEPOSIT.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_DEPOSIT.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_PARTNER.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.DEPOSIT_USE_SEQ = #{param.depositUseSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예치금 사용 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.PARTNER_CD = #{param.partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.RESERV_NUM = #{param.reservNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
ORDER BY EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST.DEPOSIT_USE_SEQ DESC /* #### SQL Body ]] ################# */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST SET /* 예치금 사용 내역 */ RESERV_NUM = #{reservNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,PAY_DIV = #{payDiv, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 지불 구분, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,PAY_TRANS_DD = #{payTransDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 송금 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,USE_DEPOSIT_AMT = #{useDepositAmt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 사용 예치 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ WHERE 1=1 AND DEPOSIT_USE_SEQ = #{depositUseSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예치금 사용 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_DEPOSIT_USE_HIST /* 예치금 사용 내역 */ WHERE 1=1 AND DEPOSIT_USE_SEQ = #{depositUseSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예치금 사용 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
